reviewText: REMOVE OBSTACLES: 5 Pastor-Driven Obstacles to Growth is a touchy, yet necessary teaching in Dick Hardy's series.  Sometimes when a church is failing or not growing as quickly as it should/could, the blame falls on the pastor, not his congregation and staff.  This set will allow each pastor to take an introspective look and critique themselves to see if they are making one or all of these mistakes.  Dick makes 2 points that really stand out to me in this teaching set: 1) a church can only grow as far as the lead pastor and 2) recognizing the problem of "short-term fatherhood" in the church.  These are 2 very real and very fixable problems in the church today and acquiring 5 Pastor-Driven Obstacles to Growth is the first step in the direction of repairing the breech.

"What personal steps can a pastor take to allow for growth?"  That may be an uncomfortable question but it is one we need to ask, answer and meditate on if we are to grow God's church.  Dick's 10 minute Coaching video is just that: Coaching.  I felt challenged, vulnerable and encouraged all at the same time.  I challenge you to prayerfully consider buying and then using this affordable resource.

You are going to enjoy Dick Hardy's down to earth approach to church life.  He isn't afraid to talk about the real heart of spiritual issues all the while giving us life giving and practical truths.  I've known Dick since back in the late 80's and his gift and ministry are genuine and trustworthy.  This is an conversational gift to the heart of every pastor looking to advance the kingdom of God and the gifts within himself and his church.  Dick gives us simple and no-nonsense answers to MAKE IT HAPPEN!

Pastor to Pastor, this resource alone is worth the cost of the entire Make It Happen series. Dick Hardy's 5 Pastor-Driven Obstacles to Growth gives 5 practical principles from a make it happen coach! Each point was clear and right on the money. Absolutely love it! You will too...

"If your church is ever going to go to the next level, it has to start with you."  In this 10-minute teaching, Dick Hardy opens our eyes to potentially five pastor-driven obstacles to growth.  As church leaders, if we are desiring to see a new culture within our congregations and growth within our churches, we have to tackle the question: "Are we growing?"

In the same manner as his other videos, Dick Hardy challenges by equipping, not condemning.  The workbook that accompanies this video proves as an excellent resource in helping admitblind spots and effectively eradicating them.  If you want your church to grow... it starts with you!
